subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Richie Sexson, a towering 33-year-old first baseman, was signed Friday by the Yankees because he has a .344 batting average against left-handers.
snippet: Richie Sexson, a towering 33-year-old first baseman, was signed Friday by the Yankees because he has a .344 batting average against left-handers.
